thread.title: New Kalgoorlie-Boulder mayor John Bowler set to take on Federal policies over antisocial behaviour
thread.title_full: New Kalgoorlie-Boulder mayor John Bowler set to take on Federal policies over antisocial behaviour - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: New Kalgoorlie-Boulder mayor John Bowler set to take on Federal policies over antisocial behaviour
text: Newly-elected Kalgoorlie-Boulder mayor John Bowler has taken aim at the Commonwealth, arguing Federal policies are to blame for increasing homelessness in the city. ...
